title: Fables of Fontaine
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plate printed on plain weave
description: Eight different framed 'pictures' each illustrating one of the Fables of la Fontaine. Each scene is captioned in French. Some of the titles on the textile have changed from the de la Fontaine title. Sepia on white. Mounted on linen plain weave, stuffed and quilted.
name: Textile
